subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Virender Sehwag of India made the highest individual score in the history of 50-over cricket, blasting 219 runs against the West Indies in Indore, India.
snippet: Virender Sehwag of India made the highest individual score in the history of 50-over cricket, blasting 219 runs against the West Indies in Indore, India.
